title: Continuity in topological spaces - misc. additions

blocks.name: mndpluscn
blocks.content: A mapping that is both a homeomorphism and a monoid homomorphism preserves the "continuousness" of the operation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Mar-2017.)
